post.author: kim
post.content:
English Club for Memorizing
=================

I want to be fluent in English, in particular, speaking and listening.

If you have the same objective as mine and want to reach it in 1 or 2 years, why donâ€™t we study together?

Method:
1.        Memorizing any topic or dialogue like news, text, transcript or movie dialogue
2.        Checking a memorizing achievement every day each other by phone except weekends

Qualification:
1.        Preferably lived in Canada over 2 years.
2.        Confident to study together over 1 year from now

Miscellaneous:
1.        No fee
2.        Just need enthusiasm

Contact:        willopen@hotmail.com
post.title: Let\\'s pratice English Memorizing together!
